references: N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).

prog: (Haskell)a000385 n = sum $ zipWith (*) sigmas $ reverse sigmas where   sigmas = take n a000203_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 20 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _Sean A. Irvine_, Nov 14 2010
